ygData.subject: Re: Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Y know, twinking never bothered me before...  but the other night I was in Everfrost and someone did a /yell for help.  I turned around to assist and there
ygData.messageBody:
> I too wish Lambent was nodrop, I'm tired of seeing level 10 bards
> running around in partial or (god forbid) full blue.

Y'know, twinking never bothered me before... but the other night I was in
Everfrost and someone did a /yell for help. I turned around to assist
and there was a Bard in full bluebecite fighting an Orc Shaman. I was
puzzled until I /conned him green to me at 19th. He had a pack of friends
with him as well casting heals.

I've never not assisted someone in trouble before (although it has sometimes
cost me a life) but I just couldn't bring myself to help out this fellow
Bard...

Still couldn't figure out where he'd got it. This was a while ago, back when
Genni wasn't in the game and most of the people on the list were trying to
figure out how to get some.

> I feel your pain, lower level bards. You get bronze now at such
> an early age and so cheap, after wearing it for 5 - 10 levels you
> desparately want an upgrade path and there is none.

That's where I am now. Low 20's, where many of the songs are nothing to look
forward to (Mellifluous Motion) and I'm making decent money now and looking
to upgrade equipment. Big gap though between what I have now (full Bronze,
Dragoon dirk and Combine LS) and the next step up...

I'm a part-time player and it's hard for me to put together a big group.
Last night we actually had a fair number of people on and were killing
Griffennes in N Karana. Of course, the only Charm of the evening was looted
by the Wizard... Grr.

- Luvas of Fennin Ro.
